name: 1502 - Ruby - Perfecto
additionalNotes: 1502 Ruby is a well rounded cigar that qualifies in the mellow to medium-bodied range for strength. This delightful cuban style cigar as a delicious profile of flavors. At first light up there is a note of white pepper with a subtle hint of roasted coffee. Further into the cigar there are flavor notes of cedar, earth, and quick spirts of citrus.
